    euclid_dist=np.array([]).reshape(m,0)
    for i in range(k):
        temp_dist=np.sum((X-Centroids[:,i])**2,axis=1) 
        euclid_dist=np.c_[euclid_dist,temp_dist]
    min_c =np.argmin(euclid_dist,axis=1)+1 
    # K ν΄λ¬μ¤ν„° κ°±μ‹ 
    Y={}
    for j in range(k):
        Y[j+1]=np.array([]).reshape(2,0) # Y λ”•μ…”λ„λ¦¬ ν‚¤, κ°’ ν• λ‹Ή
    for i in range(m):
        Y[min_c[i]]=np.c_[Y[min_c[i]],X[i]] # Y λ”•μ…”λ„λ¦¬ ν‚¤(Kν΄λ¬μ¤ν„°), κ°’(GDP, GDP_growth) ν• λ‹Ή
    for j in range(k):
        Y[j+1]=Y[j+1].T # μ „μΉν–‰λ ¬
    for j in range(k):
        Centroids[:,j]=np.mean(Y[j+1],axis=0) # K ν΄λ¬μ¤ν„° μ¤‘μ‹¬ κ°±μ‹ 
    Output=Y
